snippet.title: Immortal Tactics: War of the Eternals - Gameplay Trailer
snippet.description:
Experience a Roguelite Turn-Based Strategy game that is fast-paced with a New Turn-Based system that will surely give strategy players and sew players alike a great time! Soon to be released on Q3 of 2022

Steam (give us a Wishlist): https://bit.ly/3xKe0W4

Join the Community!
Twitter: https://bit.ly/3Orbpq1
Discord: https://bit.ly/36Nnq8k

Know More
Website: https://bit.ly/3OvMnG6

Lead your army to victory by exploring the world of Amatereia and defeating the Celestial Void! Experience a turn-based strategy game that is fast-paced with constant conflict and with different characters and leaders to choose from. A difficult and strategic game that would suit anyone.
